hadiths.text: It was narrated from Aisha (ra) that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ)prayed in a khamisah that had markings, then he said:"These markings distracted me. Take it to Abu Jahm and bring me his Anbijani (a woolen garment with no markings)

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي خَمِيصَةٍ لَهَا أَعْلاَمٌ
chapter.eng-name: The concession for praying in a khamisah (a kind of garment) that has markings
